survey_name: Community Feedback on Public Art Installations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather community opinions on recent public art installations to guide future projects and enhance cultural engagement.

questions.question_text: How often do you notice or interact with public art installations in your community?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale for single-choice responses. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you notice or interact with public art installations in your community?

questions.question_text: Which of the following public art installations have you visited in the past year? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Limit to 5 options for readability.

script.question_text: Which of the following public art installations have you visited in the past year? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What emotions or thoughts do public art installations typically evoke in you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Use a text box with a 300-character limit.

script.question_text: What emotions or thoughts do public art installations typically evoke in you?

questions.question_text: How important is it for your community to invest in public art installations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice responses. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How important is it for your community to invest in public art installations?

questions.question_text: What themes or styles would you like to see in future public art installations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather creative input. Use a larger text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What themes or styles would you like to see in future public art installations?
